title: Hour 3 - Doug Gottlieb & Bucky Brooks Guest Hosting
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Doug Gottlieb & Bucky Brooks Guest Hosting
description:
Doug and Bucky filling in for Dan.  They get boots-on-the-ground reaction in Cleveland to the Deshaun Watson settlement with Zac Jackson who covers the Browns for The Athletic. Doug and Bucky go through the NFL and hit on all of the hot topics including the Steelers quarterback situation and the Patriots' play-calling.  Plus, Doug and Bucky give their thoughts on the new Amazon Thursday Night Football theme song.  

#DougGottliebShow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
